home.content-1: SoLocked is a web application whose purpose is to keep and let you manage the information about your account in one place.
home.content-2: SoLocked is an online expanding organizer that can only be accessed by you, the passcode holder.

informations.title: Keep safe all your accounts information in one place.

what.title: What is SoLocked?
what.content: SoLocked is a web application whose purpose is to keep and let you manage the information about your accounts in one place.

why.title: Why SoLocked?
why.content: What if the “account specialist” never owns youfont again? What if you always had all information about all your accounts with you, always?

whatAbout.title: What about security?
whatAbout.content: Zero Knowledge.” “Auto logout.” You keep your big bad password safe AND you do not leave your safe open. Want more? Click on read more
